question: using a computer everyday can have more negative than positive effects on young children.. do you agree or disagree.
text: Nowadays, it is observed that regular use of computer among young children is increasing considerably.  Although there are some negative aspects of using this technology, but the significance of using computer among youngsters could not be underestimated.

To embark with, the computer has assisted youngsters to improve their learning, creativity and skills in many ways. For instance, in their educational prospects, they can easily access online books, tutorials, webinars to get a better understanding of their relevant topic. In addition to this, they could easily access and register to online courses offered by skilled professionals all over the world, which is time saving on one hand and cost effective on the other, for example, through Skype or Facebook. Furthermore, from an economic viewpoint, advancement in technology had made it readily accessible and affordable.

On the other hand, irrational use of computers may cause serious consequences  among the users. Children spending hours on the internet to watch a movie, playing a video game or chat with friends,preferred to stay isolated and their social life would be affected in a long run. Furthermore, prolong on screen time would lead to sedentary lifestyle with less physical activity that could eventually affect their health. For these reasons parents need to have a strict check to monitor the activity of their children.

In conclusion, I believe the computer has significantly showed new horizon to assist youngster to improve their skill and creativity if used in a sensible manner. Furthermore, parents should actively  monitor their children for sensible use of this technology.
